facts.fact: Zapier integrates with over 3,000 apps, allowing users to automate workflows without coding.
Zapier has been recognized as a leading automation tool for small to medium-sized businesses.
Zapier offers a free plan that allows users to create simple automations with limited features.
Zapier's user base has grown significantly, with millions of users automating their tasks.

risks: Potential market saturation with similar automation tools.
Changes in user preferences towards more customizable solutions.
Regulatory changes in data privacy affecting integrations.
